selected_skills.name: identify_objects_in_diagram
selected_skills.purpose: To identify and extract relevant geometric elements and their relationships from the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash and object attributes to identify points, lines, and angles in the diagram.

selected_skills.name: sympy_solve
selected_skills.purpose: To solve equations derived from the geometric relationships in the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the equations and variables to find the measure of angle H.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer in the required format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the final answer to return it in the format: Answer: ...

new_skill_specs.name: deduce_angle_measure
new_skill_specs.purpose: To deduce the measure of an unknown angle using known angles and geometric relationships.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The measure of the unknown angle.
edge_cases: All known angles are required to deduce the unknown angle.
Relations must be correctly identified and applicable.
